labels.name: story
labels.value: Adding a product to the cart and proceeding to checkout

labels.name: testClass
labels.value: Adding a product to the cart and proceeding to checkout

name: Adding a product to the cart and proceeding to checkout
description:
As a user,
  I want to search for a product,
  Add it to the cart,
  And validate that it has been added to the cart

steps.name: Given  I am on the homepage
When  I search for "Digital Storm" and add the product with name "Digital Storm VANQUISH 3 Custom Performance PC" to the cart
Then  I validate that the product with SKU "DS_VA3_PC" and name "Digital Storm VANQUISH 3 Custom Performance PC" is in the cart
And  I proceed to checkout as a guest

parameters.name: Product_Name
parameters.value: Digital Storm VANQUISH 3 Custom Performance PC
